channel.title: relevant sound/dj hanif
channel.description: soulful mixes by relevant sound's dj hanif.
channel.itunes:subtitle: soulful sounds for soulful people
channel.itunes:author: dj hanif
channel.itunes:summary: soulful mixes by relevant sound's dj hanif.

item.title: Relevant Sound Feb 2012
item.description: Relevant Sound Feb 2012 Music for young lovers and birthday wishes to the Feb crew. Peace Afroseeds feat. Soul Maestro/Your Love (Vocal Mix) Migosy/Skyline (Rancido Deep Journey Main Mix) Gmbos and C Pilay feat. lil Soul/Elements of Mind Body and Soul (Jazzy Piano Mix) DJ Garphie feat. George Sida/Take Me Home (Andy Compton Remix) J Paul Getto/3000 (Original) Djeff Afrozila Presents Gari Sinedima/Piluka (Vocal Main Mix) Monocles & Slezz feat. Mxolisi Ndongeni & Maestro de Casa/So Fine (Original Vocal Mix) Joel Alter feat. Eric D Clark/Rules of Love Akabu feat. Foremost Poets/Crystalized (Original Underground Mix) Jazzanova feat. Thief/Lie (Soldiers of House AB Reworked Mix) Leon feat. Corrina Joseph/I Follow You (Deetron's Springtime Leaves Mix) Luminous/Africa Unity Afro Devoted feat. Kholi/Soul on Fire (Rune Mix) The Realm & V/One Chance (Aki Bergen Dub-O-Matic Mix) Tarantulaz feat. Tiffany Loren/I Wasn't Kidding (Danny Krivit Edit) Gigolo Supreme/Invitation Rennie Foster feat. Aaron Carl/Savior (Coyu and Edu Imbernon Remix)
item.dc:creator: dj hanif

item.title: Relevant Sound Jan 2012
item.description: Relevant Sound Jan 2012 Happy New Year to all the Fam. Ta-Ice feat. Poppy Nomakhuwa/ 77Alburnum (Reprise Mix) Sundae feat. Nomhle/Xhosa Tribe (Da Capo's Bapedi Ritual Remix) Problem Child/Mphiri Villa (Main) Vivk Lavender feat. Pete Jericho/Vaporizer (AbicahSoul Vocal Mix) Monocles & Slezz/Gypsy Town (Kadasma Theme Mix) Bucie/Get Over It (Sun-El Sithole Remix) Paul Deep feat. Sheyi/Alafia (Cuebur Vocal Spirit Mix) Wayne Gardiner feat. Jahzara/Always In My Dreams (Ambient Vox Mix) J Paul Getto/3000 (Original) Loftsoul feat. Lisa Millet/Dear Friend (DJ Spinna Remix) Bliss feat. Masmin/Jungle Voyage (Groove Assassin Tribal Instrumental) The Djoon Experience/Catalina (Jose Marquez Mix) Ben Westbeech/Falling (Deetron Paradise Vocal Remix) Stelios Vassiloudis/Bite Down (Original) Carlos Vargas feat. Nicole Mitchell/Missing You (Groove Assassin Beatdown Mix) Aki Bergen feat. Carmen Sherry/Into My Soul (Spiritchaser Remix) Zaki Ibrahim/Swimming Peace

item.title: The Big Love Show
item.description: Here is a set I threw down on KZSU's Big Love Show July 25th. Thanks to JoJo Torres and Jack Wang for hookin' a brother up. Peace... The Big Love Show Glenn Underground f. Swaylo/So Amazing (GU's Main Mix) Anane/Terra Lounge (Zephrine Saint Remix) Koyla f. Zaki Ibrahim/Wake with the Day (Boddhi Satva Afriki Soul Mix) Da Soul & Farby Diglio f. Ngakula/Musoko Soukali (Rancido's Deep Spirits Dub) Zakes Bantwini f. Xolani Sithole/Clap Your Hands (Club Mix) Alpha & Olmega f. Sheyi & Thuli/Isandwana (Alpha & Olmega Pt 2 Vox) Charles Webster f. Diviniti/Learning to Love Me (P's Deep Soul Mix) Mikki Afflick f. Mona Bode/I Am Africa (Khanya Balani Vox Mix) Dovie Cote (inblueblackness)/East of the Sun (GU's Fusion Beyond Mix) Eltonnick/Simple Twist Deetron f. Ovasoul 7/I Cling Bluelle/We Are Africa Drumattix/Heart Beat (Nick Holder Main Mix) Musaria f. Saturna/Moment (Atjazz Astro Mix) Radiohead/Everything In Its Right Place (White) Nativelement f. Mtika/Ndimamele (Doc Link Liberate Mix) Donaeo/I (Sean McCabe Remix) Black Coffee f. Tsepo/Never Saw You Coming (DJ Spinna Galactic Soul Mix) Reel People f. Tony Momrelle/Star (Manuel Tur Remix)

item.title: Special Request
item.description:
A mix of personal favorites for all of the family who have been hitting me up for some House Music. Enjoy. Past Tense (Rancido's Deep Journey Soul RMX)/Leroy Styles Uhuru (Cuebur Mix)/Nathan X Hard Time For Lovers (Main)/Rocco & C. Robert Walker HashMan (Main)/Stephen Rigmaiden, Randy Torrance & JoJo Torres In My Lifetime (Deetron Remix)/Ezel feat. Tamara Mellons Come Back Home (Alex Dimitri Gotta Deep Mix)/D-tRix feat. Teddy B Miezekatze/Ogris Debris Sakura (GU's Stage 73 Mix)/GU & Loftsoul Never Saw You Coming (DJ Spinna Galactic Soul Mix)/Black Coffee feat. Tsepo Precious (Deetron RMX)/Tony Lionni feat. Marvin Belton Numb (Rigmaiden Broken Love Mix)/Stephen Rigmaiden Dame Mas (Soul Essential & Julius Papp Vocal Mix)/Julius Papp feat. D'layna Juju (Original Mix)/Black Coffee feat. Zakes Bantwini High Priest (Original Mix)/GummiHz Loving You (Stephen Rigmaiden Remix)/Andy Compton feat. Rowan Kuar (Henrik Schwarz RMX)/Emmanuel Jal Gonna Be My Day (Henrik Schwarz Acoustronic RMX)/Marsmobil I Got Life (KemeticJust Original Deep Mix)/KemeticJust If you dig this podcast:
1. Let me know, hit me on Myspace
2. Let your peeps know and leave your comments on the iTunes music store!

item.title: Joy Sessions/January Late Set
item.description: The second set of a collection of deep house that I dropped at our monthly residency Joy. Again, peace to all the dancers who rocked the cypher and to all of the true heads who stayed for the late night session. You can check out Cali, Cecil, B-Brown and myself every second Saturday @ Joy, 9pm until 3am, Som, 2925 16th St. San Francisco. One love. Come On(Original)/Sandy Rivera feat. Sabynaah It's The Spirit(Soul Dynamic Go Deep Mix)/DJ Romain & Darryl D Bonneau City High(Sophisticado VoCal)/DJ Mix & Vick Lavender feat. Carla Prather Heaven(Marlon D & Groove Assassins Remix)/Kem God Will Set Me Free(Genairo Nvilla"s Soulful Remix)/Leroy Styles feat. MC Crown Equinox (Heavenly Club Mix)/Code 718 I Don't Know Why(Juniors's Vocal Mix)/Junior White feat. Noelle Black Label 58(Last Days Exit)/Jay Shepheard Your Kiss(Andy Compton Soul Jam Mix)/Bucie You're All I Want(Main)/Brother's Vibe Invitaion/Gigolo Supreme A Little More Love(Main)/Sean McCabe & Adeola Ranson Heal My Heart(Fanatix Heal My Soul Mix)/Kerri Chandler feat. Treasa Diva Fennie If you dig this podcast: 1. Let me know, hit me on Myspace 2. Let your peeps know and leave your comments on the iTunes music store!

item.title: Joy Sessions/January Early Set
item.description:
The first set of a collection of deep house that I dropped at our monthly residency Joy. Peace to all the dancers who rocked the cypher and to all of the true heads who stayed for the late night session. You can check out Cali, Cecil, B-Brown and myself every second Saturday @ Joy, 9pm until 3am, Som, 2925 16th St. San Francisco. The Joy Sessions/January Set 2 is coming soon, stay tuned. One love. And She Moves(Tea Party Mix)/Taino Leon Brand New Day(Dance Ritual Mix)/Louie Vega & Blaze Maboko Na Ndouzou(Main)/Boddhi Satva Fugama Unamathe(Koro's Tantric Soul Remix)/Qness feat. Oluhle Uzongilinda(Rancido Deep Journey)/Qness feat. Malehloka I Might Do Something Wrong(Part Two)/Tortured Soul Simply Yes(Original)/Shur-I-Kan feat. Alexander East That's All I Needed/Kerri Chandler With Out You(Jason B Dub)/Kem Don't Laugh(Manoo's Laugh Mix)/Winx Dennis Ferrer/Hey Hey Gotta Have House(Knee Deep Original)/Knee Deep & DJ Spen feat. Biblical Jones Into My Life(Main)/Elements Of Life feat. Lisa Fischer & Cindy Mizelle If you dig this podcast:
1. Let me know, hit me on Myspace
2. Let your peeps know and leave your comments on the iTunes music store!

item.title: Joy Sessions/December
item.description:
A collection of deep house and broken beat I dropped at our monthly residency Joy. You can check out Cali, Cecil, B-Brown and myself every second Saturday @ Joy, 9pm until 3am, Som, 2925 16th St. San Francisco. One love. Nobody Else But You(Main Mix)/C. Robert Walker Bacio(Kiss)[Main Mix]/Wayne Gardiner feat. Karina Uthando(DJ Rork Rework)/Kentphonik feat. Mimi Frequency 303/Glenn Underground It's The Spirit(Souldynamic Go Deep Mix)/DJ Romain & Darryl D Bonneau Get Ready(Halo Dub Vocal Mix)/DJ Le Roi ft. Chappell Angel(Vick Lavender VLE Master Mix)/Soundphaze God Will Set Me Free(Genairo Nvilla's Soulful Remix)/Leroy Styles feat. MC Crown The Mood(Dubby Mood)/Luis Radio & Raffa Look Inside(Izmabad Dub)/4Hero Do For Love(Bopstar's Broken Beat Re-Touch)/Vick Lavender feat. RJ Green Outta Love(IG Culture Bruk For The Love Refit)/Reel People feat. Omar In 2 Deep/Tom Bulwer & 2 Deep If you dig this podcast:
1. Let me know, hit me on Myspace
2. Let your peeps know and leave your comments on the iTunes music store!

item.title: Joy Sessions/November
item.description:
A collection of deep house that I dropped at our new monthly party Joy. Peace to Ron Trent for blessing us with a serious set and to all the dancers for representing. You can check out Cali, Cecil, B-Brown and myself every second Saturday @ Joy, 9pm until 3am, Som, 2925 16th St. San Francisco. One love. Sea Lion Woman/Christine & Katherine Shipp See Line Woman(Sydenham & Chandler Remix)/Nina Simone Please Have Mercy On Me(DJ Umbi Deep Mix)/Big Mojo The Way we Feel(glen S Remix)/MoWz feat. Farida Meville Tamboula(Culoe de Song Kamnguni Dub)/Soundita's Rebels Oya(Space Mix)/Abicah Soul vs Halo Be My Number One(Azee Deep Dub)/Bobby Magnifque Midnight Ceremony/Boobjazz Out Of This World(Spinna Mix)/Anto Vitale feat. Tamara Wellons Focus(Ian Friday Tea Party Mix)/Jon Cutler feat. Vanessa Freeman Da Na Ma(Manoo Remix)/Yacoub Sunshine & Twilight/DJ Oji & Carolyn Victorian Umoja(Boddhisatva Ancestral Soul Remix)/Mzee feat. Kampi Moto Don't Laugh(Manoo's Laugh Remix)/Winx If you dig this podcast:
1. Let me know, hit me on Myspace
2. Let your peeps know and leave your comments on the iTunes music store!

item.title: Heat Up Vol.1
item.description:
Part one of a collection of Summer house and broken beat. 1.Mercyless(Ajazz Vocal)/Fred Everything feat, Wayne Tennant 2.How Fly This Life Is/Karizma 3.Let It Fall(Main)/Lady Alma and The Rainmakers 4.Gypsy Bucket/Knee Deep 5.Reach 4 The Stars(Big Room Vocal)/Lem presents Allen Travis 6.Heat Up(Awaaz Club Edit)/Peven Everett 7.The Heart Is A Lonely Hunter(Louie Vega Remix)/ Thievery Corporation feat. David Byrne 8.Filaw (Chief Boima Remix)/Issa Bagayogo 9.African Subway/Culoe de Song 10.Piri Wango Iya(Rise Ashen Morning Come Remix)/Geoffrey Oryema 11.Strikehard/Troubleman 12.Mindbender/Delgui 13.1998(Shur-I-Kan MicroRave Mix)/Milton Jackson 14.Dream In Color/Spencer Gray 15.Oddyssey/Delgui 16.Oh Lord(Kenny Dope Remix)/Mishal Moore 17.What You Want(Original Mix)/Sueno Soul feat. Denzie 18.Manhood (Original)/Vikter Duplaix If you dig this podcast:
1. Let me know, hit me on Myspace
2. Let your peeps know and leave your comments on the iTunes music store!

item.title: Moca's Jam
item.description:
Here is a set I dropped at Moca's going-away jam. Happy trails my brotha, the scene will miss your energy. Peace to JoJo Torres and Trini for throwing down some big tunes. One Love... Tracklist: Shine(Get Up)/Joi Cardwell Ubatuba(BSC Samba Jazz Mix)/Brazilian Soul Crew New Day/Atelewo African Subway/Culoe De Song Hiya Kaya(Rocco Deep Mix)/Kentphonic Outboard Jeopardy/Modaji TimeLoveLife/Pirahnahead Beneath The Sea/Greenbelt That's All I Need/Kerri Chandler M.U.S.I.C.(Atjazz Floor Dub)/Andre Zimma We Are Lonely/Studio Apt. Feat. Terrance Downs Without You(White)/Kem Don't Laugh(Manoo's Laugh Remix)/Winx 2nite's Da Nite/Mowgly Radar Du/Osunlade Love & Happiness/River Ocean Feat. India Yemaya(John Beltran Mix)/Sin Palabras Mental Black Resurrection(Dub)/Glenn Underground If you dig this podcast:
1. Let me know, hit me on Myspace
2. Let your peeps know and leave your comments on the iTunes music store!

item.title: Noir
item.description:
Here is some moody downtempo soul, beatdown, broken beat and house. Peace to Hey Love and to all the downtempo heads out there.


One love...



Tracklist:
Slippin' Into Darkness/War Without You(Jay Dee Remix)/Lucy Pearl Eve(Jay Dee Remix)/Spacek Put That On My Momma/Riton Falling Away/Harmonic 313 Hungry Ghost/Riton Visions(Part One)/Delgui Everything/Radio Citizen Salome/Joash Broken Samba(Electric Mix)/Marc Mac Outta Love(4Hero Mix)/Reel People Feat. Omar Heartbeats of Africa/Beatfantastic Bird Song(Earthbound Mix)/The Underwolves Falling/Gaelle Grover(Vikter Duplaix Beats)/King Britt Stronger Than Pride(Karizma K2 Remix)/Sade Think Twice(Mark E Remix)/Detroit Experiment Let Me Go/Reggie Dokes Nothing Can Stop Us Now/Rollercone Map Point Baby(Hue Mix)/Rithma Inside(Henrik Schwarz Remix)/John Arnold Clouds Are Gone(Henrik Schwarz Remix)/Alton Miller Sweat No Sleep(Broken Soul Dub)/Atjazz & MDCL Grover(Vikter Duplaix Remix)/King Britt If you dig this podcast:
1. Let me know, hit me on Myspace
2. Let your peeps know and leave your comments on the iTunes music store!

item.title: Home Cookin' Sessions Vol. 2
item.description:
Here is a house mix I dropped in preparation for the Home Cookin' loft party. Again, peace to the RS crew and to all the dancers who came out. One Love. Tracklist: Yes/Rasmus Faber feat. Dyanna Fearon Jungle Orchidz/Phlash & Friends Temptation/Steel Vybe Heaven(Marlon D & Groove Assassins RMX)/Kem Magic(Extended Mix)/FCKS feat. Biblical Jones I'm Not Afraid Of The Future(Joey Negro Medusa Mix)/Akabu Acid Crash/TYree If you dig this podcast:

item.title: Home Cookin' Sessions Vol. 1
item.description:
A selection of Downtempo grooves I prepared for the Home Cookin' loft party. Peace to the Relevant Sound crew and to all the dancers who came out and made it a lovely evening. Tracklist: What is Wrong With Groovin'/Letta Mbulu California Soul/Marlena Shaw Runnin'/Visioneers Blind Man Can See It/James Brown Water Get No Enemy/D'Angelo, Femi Kuti + Macy Gray Funky Drummer(Bonus Beat)/James Brown Ifa/Tunji Oyelana & The Benders E.V.A./Jean-Jacques Perrey Mind Power/James Brown Rock Steady/Aretha Franklin Family Affair/Sly and the Family Stone Umi Says/Mos Def N.E.S.T.A 75/Antibalas Afrobeat Orchestra See-Line Woman/Nina Simone Expansions/Lonnie Liston Smith If you dig this podcast:

item.title: Live @The People 2/28/09 BY Hanif
item.description:
Here is a special birthday set I threw down at
THE PEOPLE. Happy birthday to Amy and Cecil, peace to all the dancers who got down and dirty in the front room and special thanks to the Kemunity for singing along to "Heaven". Tracklist: 1. Brighter Days(Original)/Aaron Jerome ft. Andreya Triana 2. Flight(Nulife Vocal Mix)/Monique Bingham & STUDIO APARTMENT 3. So Amazing(GU's Main Vox Mix)/Glenn Underground ft. Swaylo 4. Mental Black Resurrection/Glenn Underground 5. Please Have Mercy On Me(DJ Umbi deep remix)/BIG MOJO 6. And She Moves...(Tea Party Mix)/Taino Leon 7. Money (King Britt Mix)/Zaki Ibrahim 8. Timbuktu Remixes (Ame Main mix)/Ferrer & Sydenham 9. Awade (Joe's Jungle Sounds Dub)/Instant House 10. See Line Woman (CASAMENA Basement Remix)/Nina Simone 11. Yes feat. Dyanna Fearon/Rasmus Faber 12. Jungle Orchidz feat Alma Horton/Phlash & Friends 13. Look Inside (Izmabad Dub)/4hero 14. Heaven (Marlon D & Groove Assassins Remix)/Kem 15. Brand New Day(Dance Ritual Mix)/Louie Vega ft.Blaze 16. Home (Knee Deep Club Mix)/Julie McKnight 17. Outta Love(IG Culture Bruk For The Love Refit) Reel People feat. Omar 18. Lost Tapes Vol 1 (New Funk Jaz)/Abicah Soul 19. On My Way/Kerri Chandler If you dig this podcast:
1. Let me know, hit me on Myspace
2. Let your peeps know and leave your comments on the iTunes music store!

item.title: HIKARI (LIGHT)
item.description:
by popular demand, here is a follow up to dj cali's fat jazz set HEAT. more uptempo jazz for the heads. dedicated to moms and pops, who filled my life with jazz, soul and love. 1. new world symphony-earth wind & fire 2. searching(Yoruba Suite Mix)-roy ayers 3. outta love (4hero remix)-omar 4. 1974-jukka eskola 5. can you feel it-christian prommer's drumlesson 6. da tempo ae tempo-guida de palma & jazzinho 7. pinkie-beat out shrine 8. gica's dance-gerardo frisina 9. moanin'-charles mingus 10. see line woman-yusef lateef 11. A.I.E.-Soil And "Pimp" Sessions 12. build an ark-build an ark 13. leaving this planet-charles earland If you dig this podcast:
1. Let me know, hit me on Myspace
2. Let your peeps know and leave your comments on the iTunes music store!

item.title: SOULFUL HOUSE MUSIC COLLAGE-Guest Spot Dec 26, 2008
item.description:
Here is a special guest mix of soulful house and broken beat that I laid down for the Soulful House Music Collage podcast. Peace to Big L. the SHM Collage Tracklist: Title/Artist 1. perfect pitch(ajukaja aero-soul mix)/una bomba 2. i'll do anything for you(yann kesz remix)/lee mc donald 3 rise(resolution) (phuture lounge original)/jonny miller 4. journey(trinidadian deep remix)/sacha 5. the lake(jay tripwire spacial sun edit)/dual city 6. the sun shines for us(nu yorikan sounz remix)/felly de feljai 7. the rite place(blakkat original)/blakkat 8. little things/restless soul feat. 1luv 9. about you(karizma boucha deepbahdub)/tonya renee 10. i cling(yoruba soul mix)/deetron feat. ovasoul7 11. 3rd eye(dixon's mash up edit)/men with sticks 12. ode to ancestral healing(dubthrudamental)/boddhisatva feat. yuba 13. believe in us(dwight brown's deep mix)/marcella feat. i-fan 14. souls like mine(long time comin')/nora bridges and alton miller 15. let them come/dan electro 16. inspirations(innocent sorcerers remix)/sistars 17. russelology(restless soul voodoo vox)/flowriders 18. samba soul(booty shakin' remix)/che marino 19. marir/gel abril 20. love is blind/nick holder If you dig this podcast:
1. Let me know, hit me on Myspace
2. Let your peeps know and leave your comments on the iTunes music store!

item.title: Zanzibar Revisited
item.description:
for all those who remember the mix of reggae, soul and house that was zanzibar. dedicated to toks, dedan and dj life. 1. her song 2. da na ma (boddhisatva ancestral soul remix) 3. reach out for love (ATFC babylon bounce) 4. get up (saltfish and bammy remix) 5. relief for free 6. now that your gone (deeper) 7. everything i see 8. outta love (ig culture bruk for the love refit) 9. on my way 10. feelin' who you are 11. soul exp (2008 revisited mix) 12. now that your gone (main vocal) 13. you are love (jay's afrotronic vocal) 14. uyangichomela 15. music for gong gong 16. another star 17. ICU 18. jo'berg's theme (roots mix) 19. look inside (izmabad dub) 20. heaven (marlon d & groove assassins remix) 21. might do something wrong (part two) 22. set them free (jepht guillaume main vocal) If you dig this podcast:
1. Let me know, hit me on Myspace
2. Let your peeps know and leave your comments on the iTunes music store!

item.title: Paradise
item.description:
cool jazz breezes, hot buttered soul and a touch of latin spice. 1. harmony blues 2. paradise 3. new life (part 2) 4. dancing on holiday 5. his presence (original mix) 6. believe in something (original vocal) 7. i'm back (in blueblackness original mix) 8. hold on (vocal mix) 9. havana 10. love (original mix) 11. winds of victoria (C&D main mix) 12. rapture[no one like you (main mix)] If you dig this podcast:
1. Let me know, hit me on Myspace
2. Let your peeps know and leave your comments on the iTunes music store!

item.title: THE PEOPLE (october)
item.description:
a taste of flavors served up at
THE PEOPLE. afro-beat, soul, jazz, house and broken beat mixed by dj hanif. i want to invite everyone to come down and groove with the relevant sound boys: be-brown, cali and cecil... at
THE PEOPLE... saturday october 25th @ oasis, 135 12th st. oakland. 9pm-3am see you in the house... If you dig this podcast:
1. Let me know, hit me on Myspace
2. Let your peeps know and leave your comments on the iTunes music store!
peace 1. you got to freedom 2. water get no enemy 3. children go round 4. brighter days 5. flight 6. losin' my head (soul dub) 7. spirits above (simbad remix) 8. na wuti musika (afriki soul mix) 9. until our work is done 10. bring me into your life 11. something's got to give 12. love supreme 13. do the right thing 14. sanctify 15. mistaken 16. perfect pitch

item.title: dogon dancers (the first afronauts)
item.description:
space is the place... afro-tech, glitch-funk and soulful house, harmonically mixed 04/01/08. peace... track listing: 1. ritual 2. step into my world 3. cycles 4. let the drummer play 5. pasta for two 6. broken dreams 7. ride 8. my joy 9. do you remember house 10. right where you are 11. thinking about your love 12. mr. cubanix 13. p 2 da j (tiger stripes rmx) 14. your beat sounds like 15. special powers 16. afro rainbow 17. i never seen it comin' 18. a black man in space 19. so brite (dub) 20. open your eyes If you dig this podcast:

2. Let your peeps know and leave your comments on the iTunes music store!

item.title: african warriors
item.description:
heavy afro-tech and soulful house. a harmonic mix recorded 2/08 in honor of black history month. dedicated to the mighty dj dedan. track listing: 1. our time is now 2. dark days 3. spirits above 4. brotherhood 5. holy ghost 6. traffic 7. fight for love 8. be my number 1 9. i cling 10.the mood 11.where we at 12.warriors of africa 13.free 14.singularity 15.time of our lives 16.mixdown 17.my sound 18.kissing strangers If you dig this podcast:
1. Let me know, hit me on Myspace
2. Let your peeps know and leave your comments on the iTunes music store!
